document_data.name: Clorde
document_data.mainbody: '''Clorde''' was a [[human]] who lived in [[Neverwinter]] in the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Clorde was merchant, but this was a cover for his true profession: he was a member of [[Bregan D'aerthe]] operating out of Neverwinter. His wagon had the habit of "breaking down" in important locations where Clorde could gather valuable information for his employers.
document_data.History: Clorde survived the first attack of the "[[Seldra Tylmarande|Lost Heir]]" of [[Alagondar]] and his [[plaguechanged]] minions of [[1479 DR]]
